name: Detective Foxy
description:
Detective Foxy

Travel your way through the world, avoiding hidden obstacles. Use your scanner to locate hidden traps and holes, dodging bombs and bullets while collecting as many coins as possible!

Enable checkpoints if you need to and don't forget to use the scanner.

Controls: "A" to move left, "D" to move right, space bar to jump, and left mouse click to use the scanner.
